A black long-sleeved T-shirt featuring a ripped front showing off the endoskeleton underneath. Un t-shirt à manche longues noir orné d'une déchirure à l'avant laissant apparaître un endosquelette. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. Ein schwarzes langärmeliges T-Shirt mit aufgerissener Vorderseite, unter der das Endoskelett zu sehen ist. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]
